origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EducationFinanceAPI.analyze_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of a financial policy on a specified sector using provided data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial policy, e.g., financial_support, tax_relief.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector the policy applies to, e.g., education, healthcare.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the policy is requested.'}, {'name': 'data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of data to analyze, e.g., financing, enrollment.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of the policy impact on the sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EducationFinanceAPI.analyze_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'financial_support', 'sector'是'education', 'year'是'2023', 'data'是'financing'.

prediction:
想法：分析金融支持政策对教育领域的影响。

动作：调用 EducationFinanceAPI.analyze_impact。

动作参数：
{
  "policyType": "financial_support",
  "sector": "education",
  "year": "2023",
  "data": "financing"
}
